title: Home Internet - Setup New Router
description: A customer bought a new router and needs help setting it up with their existing modem.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their internet service type (e.g., Cable, Fiber).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer has a cable internet service.

tasks.description: Guide the customer through the physical connection: modem to router WAN port, computer to router LAN port.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear step-by-step connection instructions.

tasks.description: Instruct the customer to power cycle the modem first, then the new router.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent explains the correct power-up sequence to ensure the modem provides an IP address to the router.
